value.title: Starcraft 2 Protoss Ladder | Commentary [2020 Gameplay]
value.excerpt: In today's Starcraft 2 gameplay video we're jumping back to playing Protoss! We'll be doing some ladder commentary and hopefully you guys pick up some helpful tips along the way. value.title: Starcraft2: Protoss Build Order Guide (Dark Templars @ 4:25!)
value.excerpt: In today's Starcraft 2 guide/lesson we are looking at a very powerful protoss vs zerg build order. value.title: Terran vs Protoss | Keep it SIMPLE, stop microing like MARU
value.excerpt: Today we look at microing vs chargelot archon as Terran. You don't need to do any flashy/wild micro to get effective results vs protoss! Keep it SIMPLE and follow a set plan of steps and you'll be crushing :)  Terran vs Protoss | Keep it SIMPLE, stop microing like MARU #StarCraft2 #Terran #Micro #TvP
